body: Isn't this reupload for over many years ago?

personally i don’t care wether she gets raped or not because of how shit the anime was on this part. killing rapist is apparently bad in the anime sooooo i guess this is what they wanted since killing is a nono xD.
Yea these rape hentais have been shit recently… i wanna see rape but the girl feels good okay?? Like this girl wasnt feeling anything until the drug took over and thats just depressjng.
Welp that's the rape category for ya, imma stay away from it for now... idk that shit just get me sad, but the art is always fire

Dawg...Wow... I wanna compliment this, but damn... It's crazy how humans make stories like this bro I wanted to beat my meat, but it wasnt even like she liked the rape, she was begging for mercy until the drug took full effect. That's wild. Like did y'all read the author's note?? "It actually felt like I was raping the character" OH HELL Nah man... Art was hot tho 👍
